pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[GitHub Pages](https://jameskabbes.github.io/repository_generator)
[PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/kabbes-repository-generator)# repository_generatorPackage for creating repositories from templates, performing operations on Git repositories
# Installation`pip install kabbes_repository_generator`
# UsageFor more in-depth documentation, read the information provided on the Pages. Or better yet, read the source code.## Python Script```pythonimport repository_generator as repo_gen``````pythonrepo_gen.generate()```## Terminal```python -m repository_generator```
# AuthorJames Kabbes
